findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled on WordPress REST API endpoints can allow attackers to read sensitive data cross-origin. This is a classic CORS vulnerability pattern on a legitimate API endpoint.
findings.exploitation_steps: 1. Host malicious JavaScript on attacker-controlled domain 2. Use fetch/XMLHttpRequest to make authenticated requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 3. Access response data that may contain sensitive information 4. Potentially enumerate other REST API endpoints for additional data exposure
